formattedAddress: 90 Worth St Store #7, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 90 Worth St Store #7, New York, NY 10013, USA

editorialSummary.text: Casual counter-serve chain for build-your-own sandwiches & salads, with health-conscious options.

originalText.text:
I visited Subway in New York City in October 2023 and had the pleasure of trying their Veggie Patty sub, and I must say it was a delightful experience. As an Indian vegetarian, finding suitable food options while traveling can sometimes be a bit challenging, but Subway definitely came through.

The Veggie Patty sub was not only delicious but also offered a healthy alternative. The patty was flavorful and had a great texture, which is often hard to find in vegetarian options. I was impressed by the fresh vegetables and condiments that complemented the patty perfectly.

What stood out for me was the service and the staff's understanding of specific dietary preferences. They were attentive and made sure my sub was prepared just the way I liked it. It's always a relief to find a place that respects the dietary choices of its customers.

Subway's New York City location provided a clean and welcoming environment, making my meal even more enjoyable. I left feeling satisfied and grateful to have found a suitable, tasty, and healthy meal option. I would highly recommend Subway to fellow Indian vegetarians and anyone looking for a satisfying and customizable dining experience. Thank you, Subway, for catering to various dietary needs!

originalText.text: Me and my friend came here, while I was ordering the worker said a word I couldn’t understand so I of course asked him to repeat himself but then quickly became agitated. Then, when I went to checkout the worker was very aggressive and told me to “scan” my credit card, took my phone and tried to scan my card even though you cannot scan credit cards?? After several tries and me telling multiple times that I could only TAP and not scan (??) her boss came over and only then was I able to pay for my food. Then to top it all off I didnt have pickles in my sandwich (which I asked for) and my friend didn’t have her tomatoes! The food was ok but the service and workers were aggressive and unpleasant.

originalText.text: I ordered for pickup and they claimed that I never ordered it from here and that I was a liar. When I showed them them on the app that I did order they said ok it’s coming up. I waited and all they did was just look at me and say why is she standing there. I said are you gonna make it and they said ok tell me your order and you pay here. I said I already showed you I payed for it and you said it’s coming up.One of the guys proceeded to call me a liar again. I waited for 20 minutes. They didn’t want to give a refund.

originalText.text: i ordered on the app. not only did the man working just watch me wait for it (it was already made), he also toasted the bread when i indicated that i didn’t want it toasted. When i politely told him, he argued with me that i needed to put it in special instructions. Will never come here again due to rude employees
